item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Blender releases their Oscar winning version tool (571 points | 182 comments)
2. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (591 points | 189 comments)
3. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (572 points | 120 comments)
4. Scientists Discover New Heavy-Metal Molecule 'Berkelocene' (33 points | 2 comments)
5. War story: the hardest bug I ever debugged (160 points | 46 comments)
6. A love letter to the CSV format (479 points | 437 comments)
7. DJ With Apple Music launches to enable subscribers to mix their own sets (110 points | 44 comments)
8. First C compiler source code from 1972 (57 points | 9 comments)
9. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (134 points | 20 comments)
10. Supabase (YC S20) Is Hiring a Senior Auth Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
11. Rost – Rust Programming in German (74 points | 24 comments)
12. MCP server for Ghidra (269 points | 46 comments)
13. Botswana launches first satellite BOTSAT-1 aboard SpaceX Falcon 9 (294 points | 118 comments)
14. Problems with the heap (146 points | 35 comments)
15. Exploring Dynamic Dispatch in Rust (25 points | 8 comments)
16. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (112 points | 6 comments)
17. The mysterious flow of fluid in the brain (88 points | 13 comments)
18. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (114 points | 37 comments)
19. Gemma3 Function Calling (146 points | 18 comments)
20. AI Reveals Secrets of Dendritic Growth in Thin Films (29 points | 5 comments)
21. The role of developer skills in agentic coding (164 points | 85 comments)
22. Ungovernable, Capricious Life (3 points | 1 comment)
23. DeepSeek-V3 Technical Report (87 points | 24 comments)
24. Unveiling the mysterious 'red sprite' lightning strikes over the Himalayas (29 points | 4 comments)
25. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (216 points | 318 comments)
26. Waymos crash less than human drivers (229 points | 226 comments)
27. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (68 points | 15 comments)
28. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (282 points | 59 comments)
29. The long-awaited Friend Compound laws in California (125 points | 165 comments)
30. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (166 points | 130 comments)
